    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:aspect.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_3ab1f931135b0a1b350e1cbec98cebb4dd603304</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_3ab1f931135b0a1b350e1cbec98cebb4dd603304</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hexagonal and cubic close-packed crystal structure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sechseckige und schließen-gepackte 
Kubikkristallstruktur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Structure en cristal fermer-emballée hexagonale 
et cubique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estrutura de cristal fech-embalada sextavada e 
cúbica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Struttura di cristallo chiud-imballata esagonale 
e cubica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξαγωνική και κυβική στενός-συσκευασμένη δομή 
κρυστάλλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estructura cristalina cerrar-pila de discos 
hexagonal y cúbica</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the two ways of stacking close-packed layers of sphere, the (a) hexagonal close-packing and (b) cubic-close packing.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cubic close-packed structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hexagonal close-packed structure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spheres</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die zwei Methoden des 
Stapelns der schließen-gepackten Schichten des Bereichs, die (a) 
sechseckige Schließenverpackung und (b) Kubik-schließen Verpackung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les deux voies 
d'empiler des couches fermer-emballées de sphère, (a) le 
fermer-emballage hexagonal et (b) cubique-ferment l'emballage.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra as duas maneiras de 
empilhar camadas fech-embaladas de esfera, (a) a fech-embalagem 
sextavada e (b) cúbico-fecha a embalagem.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i due modi di 
impilamento degli strati chiud-imballati della sfera, (a) 
l'chiud-imballaggio esagonale e (b) cubico-chiude l'imballaggio.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει δύο τρόπους τα 
στενός-συσκευασμένα στρώματα της σφαίρας, της (α) εξαγωνικής 
στενός-συσκευασίας και (β) της κυβικός-στενής συσκευασίας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las dos maneras de 
empilar capas cerrar-pila de discos de la esfera, (a) el 
cerrar-embalaje hexagonal y (b) cu'bico-cierra el embalaje.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schließen-gepackte Kubikstruktur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">sechseckige schließen-gepackte Struktur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bereiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">structure fermer-emballée cubique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">structure fermer-emballée hexagonale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">sphères</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estrutura fech-embalada cúbica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estrutura fech-embalada sextavada</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">esferas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura chiud-imballata cubica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">struttura chiud-imballata esagonale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sfere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κυβική στενός-συσκευασμένη δομή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξαγωνική στενός-συσκευασμένη δομή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σφαίρες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estructura cerrar-pila de discos cúbica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estructura cerrar-pila de discos hexagonal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">esferas</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
